It enjoyed a positive critical reception on release in late 1977

It reached No. 3 in the UK and stayed in the charts for 26 weeks
, but was less successful in the US where it peaked at No. 35. The album was released in Germany with the title track renamed
Heroes
and partly in German. An early instance of the album's enduring influence is
